actionCalls.name: myRule_18_A2
actionCalls.label: Send Email To RSM and PlM when Quote is Cancelled

actionCalls.name: myRule_20_A2
actionCalls.label: Send Email To RSM And PLM

actionCalls.name: myRule_22_A1
actionCalls.label: Send email to RSM and PLM

actionCalls.name: myWaitEvent_myWait_myRule_29_event_0_SA1
actionCalls.label: Send RSM and PLM Approval EMAIL

actionCalls.name: myWaitEvent_myWait_myRule_29_event_1_SA1
actionCalls.label: Send Email to RSM and PLM

rules.name: myRule_18
rules.label: When status of Quote is Changed to Cancelled

rules.name: myRule_20
rules.label: Send Email when Status is Updated To Order Received

rules.name: myRule_22
rules.label: When status is updated to Ship and Debit approved

rules.name: myRule_24
rules.label: When status is changed to Approval Cycle Completes

value.stringValue: NOT(ISNEW() ) && NOT(ISCHANGED([Quote].Ship_Debit__c )) && NOT(ISBLANK([Quote].S_D_End_Date__c )) && ISCHANGED([Quote].S_D_End_Date__c) && [Quote].S_D_End_Date__c > TODAY() && NOT(ISBLANK([Quote].Ship_Debit__c ))
AND( ISCHANGED([Quote].Status ), ISPICKVAL([Quote].Status,'Ship and Debit Approved') )
